sentences: Bruno Ravel (born May 1, 1964) is a bassist and guitarist, best known for playing in the band Danger Danger in which he is the main composer.
He also guested on TNT's All the Way to the Sun and My Religion.
In 1998, Ravel played in the 1998 tour with German singer Nena.
Ravel had a side band, Westworld which released four albums between 1998 and 2002.
